thread.title: Predators excited for season opener on Thursday
thread.title_full: Predators excited for season opener on Thursday

title: Predators excited for season opener on Thursday
text:
Predators excited for season opener on Thursday 
Updated: Wed, Oct 07 2015, 11:05 PM 
Stream WZTV Fox 17 Newscasts LIVE starting with Fox 17 This Morning at 4:30am, News at 5:30pm and News at 9pm & 10 pm 

The Nashville Predators open their 2015 season on Thursday night against the Carolina Hurricanes. Peter Laviolette and his players are excited to get going. 
See what is awaiting fans at Bridgestone Arena and hear from the Predators head coach. 
The puck drops just after 7 pm. FOX 17 Sports will have live reports from Smashville on Thursday. 

Follow the FOX 17 Sports Team on Twitter: Paul Jones | Dan Phillips | Dave Foster
